embeddedItem.name: Shattered Blade
embeddedItem.desc: Weapon fragments left behind by members of the Antimatter Legion. Used to level up Traces slightly for Destruction characters.
embeddedItem.lore:
This brand represents their rank and accomplishments in the name of Destruction.
The master of this weapon rides on a scarlet horse to ignite cities, to take peace from humankind, and to bring down nations akin to anthills.

"The bearer of this brand is tasked with driving peace out of nations."

39351.name: Nowhere to Run
39351.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
39351.lore:
This isn't the first time he's seen this man.
This man had become his own inseparable shadow.
No matter how many times he runs this man through with his spear, the man always comes back.

He can neither lose to this man, nor truly win.
Though he wants to run away, there is nowhere to run.

61765.name: Arlan
61765.lore:
The head of Herta Space Station's Security Department.
This quiet boy hopes to protect the researchers who value their pursuit of knowledge, and to help them to complete their work.

79827.name: Something Irreplaceable
79827.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
79827.lore:
"Should a day come when even I'm not here anymore, please look after this database, Svarog."
(Who is this... Why is this message in my records...)
"Do you have something that's irreplaceable, Svarog?"
(Irreplaceable... broken parts... can simply be replaced...)
"You'll definitely find it one day, Svarog."
(Such things... will only cause trouble...)

"When that time comes... You should leave this place behind."

79836.name: The Unreachable Side
79836.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
79836.lore:
He would come to this place every year, bringing new swords with him each time.
He had seen all the owners of the swords draw their last breath.
Every time he leaves, he would sorrowfully ponder...

When would his own blade be brought here by someone else?

107621.name: Hook
107621.lore:
Boss (self-proclaimed) of an Underworld adventure squad, The Moles.
She loves freedom and sees life as a series of adventures.

132014.name: Blade
132014.lore:
A member of the Stellaron Hunters, and a swordsman who abandoned his body to become a blade.
Pledges loyalty to "Destiny's Slave," and possesses a terrifying self-healing ability.

142908.name: On the Fall of an Aeon
142908.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
142908.lore:
It began with a flash of light.
One by one, they fell as the threat of expiration loomed over them.
They had to stop self-replicating and rushed to embrace each other,
trying to offer the right to reproduce in exchange for a possibility of survival.
They held hands in a show of unprecedented unity.
...But the Paths met an abrupt end,
and they were headed to a true death.

170099.name: Clara
170099.lore:
A vagrant girl who lives with robots.
She is introverted, gentle, and has a pure heart.
She wishes for all Underworlders to become a family.

175713.name: Trailblazer
175713.lore:
A girl/boy who boarded the Astral Express.
They chose to travel with the Astral Express to eliminate the dangers posed by the Stellaron.

460240.name: Trailblazer
460240.lore:
A girl/boy who boarded the Astral Express.
They chose to travel with the Astral Express to eliminate the dangers posed by the Stellaron.

676261.name: Mutual Demise
676261.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
676261.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"How does one make perfect the past of a planet? Now — immediately — rend the planet asunder."

754822.name: The Moles Welcome You
754822.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
754822.lore:
"Moles, moles,"
"Leaving our holes,"
"Smart moles fear naught foes,"
"Moles, moles,"
"Bite your toes!"

792910.name: Collapsing Sky
792910.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
792910.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"The death of all things is as natural as their birth. Time erodes everything, turning all tangible entities to dust."

792919.name: Shattered Home
792919.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
792919.lore:
A drop of strength condensed from time itself. All the seemingly insignificant moments come together to form the magnificent choir of fate.

"Absolute control comes from the ability to inflict total destruction."

838766.name: A Secret Vow
838766.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
838766.lore:
The boy would always make sure that his gloves and elbow guards were in good shape before leaving.
He treasured his gloves more than anything because they were tight enough to hide secrets.
With this layer of protection, no one could see the bandages on his hand and the wound beneath them.
He would be treated as if he was normal, and he would be greeted just like everyone else.

That was all he asked for.

838775.name: Under the Blue Sky
838775.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
838775.lore:
Under the blue sky, fields of wheat were dancing.
The young girl was carefully weaving a flower wreath,
for her most beloved little sister.

That was when they were still the same height.
That was when they shared the same smile.

955407.name: Woof! Walk Time!
955407.desc: Light Cone for the Path of Destruction. The Light Cone ability is only effective for characters of this Path.
955407.lore:
Pity that no one has seen it...
Seen it screw up its nose and sniff around and dive into an empty path.

Pity that no one has seen it...
Seen it retract its claws, enter the password, and leap into the embraces of freedom.

Has nobody seen it still...?
A grown dog can now walk itself in space!
